title: Implement cross-repository automation and unified issue management
body:
Goal: Enable automation and issue management across multiple repositories (ghcommon, subtitle-manager, etc.) from a single workflow.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Unified workflow can create, update, and close issues across multiple repos.
- Automation can trigger actions (e.g., PRs, labels, comments) in related repos.
- Permissions and tokens are managed securely for cross-repo actions.
- Documentation is updated to describe cross-repo automation patterns.
- Example scripts and templates are provided.

Technical Notes:
- Use GitHub Actions with 'repository_dispatch' or GitHub API.
- Use reusable workflows and composite actions for DRY automation.
- Ensure audit logging and traceability for all cross-repo actions.
- See .github/workflows/reusable-unified-issue-management.yml for patterns.
